name: Introspective
description:
A music game built to accompany Trev Wignall's 'Introspective', a remix of the New Division song of the same name.

Arrow keys control movement.

1 , 2 , 3 , 4 keys switch the camera angle.

Press space to pause.

Find the remix on its own at : https://trevwignall.bandcamp.com/album/introspective

(Download includes flac and mp3 files of the remix)

Find the original track at: https://thenewdivision.bandcamp.com/album/introspe...
